data.title: Carmine Giovinazzo: Credits, Bio, News & More
data.meta_description: Searching to find out more about Carmine Giovinazzo? We have a full Biography, Photos, Theatre Credits, TV and Movies, Videos and more! Check out Carmine Giovinazzo's bio now including film and tv, as well as on stage.
data.text:
Carmine Giovinazzo News

SHAMELESS Actress Maria Breese Signs With Studio Matrix

Actress and producer Maria Breese has signed with Studio Matrix; for publicity and brand management by Wendy Shepherd. As an actress, Maria is most known for her role as Lina in the Showtime series 'Shameless,' her role as Erika Schultz in Hulu's horror series 'Dark/Web,' and her recurring role as Crystal in Vice's comedy series 'All Wrong.'

Actor Jermaine Rivers Signs With Studio Matrix

SAG-AFTRA award-winning actor Jermaine Rivers has signed with Studio Matrix; for publicity and brand management by Wendy Shepherd. Jermaine is notable for his recurring role as Shatter on the Marvel / Fox hit series 'The Gifted,' a superhero television series based on Marvel Comics' X-Men properties.

SAG-AFTRA Foundation to Honor Kerry Washington with Actors Inspiration Award

The SAG-AFTRA Foundation announced today that SAG, Emmy, Golden Globe nominated Actress Kerry Washington will receive the Actors Inspiration Award

SAG Foundation to Open 30th Anniversary Celebration with Annual LA Golf Classic

The Screen Actors Guild Foundation, celebrating 30 years of giving back, announced its 6th Annual Los Angeles Golf Classic to be held Monday, June 8th at an exclusive golf club in Burbank, California. The SAG Foundation L.A. Golf Classic is a tournament where celebrity golfers and entertainment industry executives raise money for the nonprofit's Catastrophic Health Fund and Emergency Assistance programs, which benefit SAG-AFTRA professionals and their families in times of need.

Aaron Tveit's GRACELAND Gets Third Season Order from USA Network

USA Network has give a 13-episode third season order for their hit drama series GRACELAND, starring Aaron Tveit. The new season is set to premiere in the summer of 2015.

Andy Garcia, Scott Bakula & More Come Out for SAG Foundation Annual Golf Charity Tournament

The Screen Actors Guild Foundation hosted the 5th Annual Los Angeles Golf Classic benefiting its Catastrophic Health Fund and Emergency Assistance programs for SAG-AFTRA performers and their families

Nestor Serrano & Brit Morgan Join Cast of USA's GRACELAND; Series Returns Tonight

Nestor Serrano (“CSI Miami”) and Brit Morgan (“True Blood”) have been cast as recurring guest stars in the highly anticipated second season of USA Network's GRACELAND

Tim Allen & Richard Karn to Co-host SAG Foundation's 5th Annual Los Angeles Golf Classic

The Screen Actors Guild Foundation will hold its 5th Annual Los Angeles Golf Classic benefiting its Catastrophic Health Fund and Emergency Assistance programs for SAG-AFTRA performers and their families

First Look At Aaron Tveit & Daniel Sunjata In GRACELAND Season Two

A preliminary sneak peek at fellow Broadway headliners and recognizable crossover stars Aaron Tveit and Daniel Sunjata on the new season of USA's hit drama series GRACELAND is now available to view.

Nestor Serrano & Brit Morgan Join Cast of USA's GRACELAND; Series Returns 6/11

Nestor Serrano (“CSI Miami”) and Brit Morgan (“True Blood”) have been cast as recurring guest stars in the highly anticipated second season of USA Network's GRACELAND

Coby Ryan McLaughlin Lands Recurring Role on USA's GRACELAND

McLaughlin will guest star as Archie, a mainstay in the LAPD's Gang Task Force. Sharp as a tack and loyal to a fault, the members of “Graceland” hope he'll be an ally in their mission to destroy the cartel.

Carmine Giovinazzo Cast in USA Drama GRACELAND

Carmine Giovinazzo (“CSI: NY”) and­­­­­­ Jon Sklaroff (“24”) will guest star in the second season of USA Network's provocative one-hour hit drama series GRACELAND

Carmine Giovinazzo & Jon Sklaroff Join USA's GRACELAND

Carmine Giovinazzo (“CSI: NY”) and­­­­­­ Jon Sklaroff (“24”) will guest star in the second season of USA Network's provocative one-hour hit drama series GRACELAND, which follows a group of elusive undercover agents from the FBI, DEA and ICE who live in a beach front mansion in Southern California. Inspired by true events, the series captured a broad freshman audience, averaging 4M total viewers. Season two of GRACELAND will premiere this summer on USA.

Emmy- and Golden Globe-Winner Sela Ward Joins 'CSI: NY' for 7th Season

Sela Ward will join the cast of CSI: NY as an experienced investigator from Washington, D.C., whose work is driven by her empathy for the victim. Ward will make her first appearance in the season premiere when the show moves to Fridays at 9:00 PM this fall.

CBS Announces Season Finales For May Sweeps

CBS's May sweep will be highlighted with the season finales and cliffhangers of its hit comedies and dramas as well as the finales of THE AMAZING RACE 16 and SURVIVOR: HEROES VS. VILLAINS.
